Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: paula
Reviews.Content: i ordered a blackberry it was a good price and i recieved it quickly....the phone was brand new and in perfect condition and i will continue to buy from this service i love my phone thanks

Reviews.Title: Good practical phone
Reviews.Author: Mom of 3
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a few months now. Seller shipped this phone and a black one promptly. Both phones in new condition. Mine replaced a touchscreen phone and the black one replaced an older flip phone for my husband. We're both happy with ease of use (much easier to text on than my touchscreen or his old flip phone), battery life, call quality, and durability. If you want a phone that does a good job of being a phone and planner without a lot of internet or social networking fluff, you will like this phone. That said, it does have a browser, but I rarely need to use it. Calendar, planner, camera, and other Blackberry functions are easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Bad phone and service
Reviews.Author: Richard Morris
Reviews.Content: It was suppose to be rebuilt.  They put a new case on it but the cover for the sd was broke and it worked sometimes.  It quit working all together in about 2 month.  Would not recommend buying there.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Arun Sharma
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife.  I had one before and knew how it works. we received it on time and good condition

Reviews.Title: Not completly happy
Reviews.Author: Bessie
Reviews.Content: Recived on time and in NEW condition. My issues are that it doesn't have BB ap world nor 3G nor wifi; and you can't have a whole picture as your background it only changes the bottom half of the wall paper. Also the bluetooth doesn't work at all it will connect to other devices but you can't send or recive pictures or songs. I think for $100 there shouldn't have been this many issues.

Reviews.Title: Okay?!?!?!
Reviews.Author: Candace
Reviews.Content: I got the phone in the mail one day early! That was nice, The phone looked brand new in the box. I only had the phone for 20 minutes and the phone froze on me 5 times!!!! This is still happening!!! Also there are people that I block on my phone and it will not allow me to do that on this phone! Other than that the phone is fine!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. Akerley
Reviews.Content: Recieved the phone quickly but the phone didn't turn on. Had to call customer service and they sent me a new one but still a hassle

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Gil
Reviews.Content: Este telefono lo compre para mi mama, y lo traje para venezuela, funciono perfecto con movistar y no amerito nada adicional, solo colocarle el chip. ha funcionado exelentemente
